content: German Scholarship (Deutschlandstipendium) of University of Bremen
Semester abroad in Bangkok, Thailand. School of Architecture and Design, KMUTT
B. Sc. Digital Media, University of Bremen
DELFI Award: Best Bachelor Thesis of 2020 in the field of educational technologies
M.A. Creative Technologies, Filmuniversity Babelsberg Konrad Wolf
Student Assistant at the library of the University of Public Administration in Bremen
Short term holiday employment at the production of Daimler plant Bremen at the production area
Student Assistant at International Office Bremen. Student Consultant for the Virtual Campus of the Young Universities for the Future of Europe (Yufe)
Lecturer / Lectureship at Informatica Feminale in Bremen with Ayla Satilsmis about 'Discrimination through Algorithms? - Ethical reflections on current challenges'
Exhibition Management and Curation of the digital art exhibition 'Beyond the Frame' at International Student Film Festival Sehsüchte
Research Assistant at FAST45 (Futures Art School Trends - 2045) at Filmuniversity Babelsberg Konrad Wolf
International Youth Voluntary Service with DJiA at German church community and senior residency at Mallorca, e.g leading of youth film project
Service Worker at Open Café at SOS Kinderdorf Bremen
PR, science communication and design management for interdisciplinary Student Research Project FORAREX. Participation at European Research Project REXUS/BEXUS
